<script src='{resource="owl.carousel.min.js" app="core" location="global"}'></script>
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/modernizr/2.8.3/modernizr.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script>
$(document).ready(function(){
  $('.owl-carousel').owlCarousel({
    margin:25,
    loop:true,
    autoWidth:true,
    items:6,
    autoplay:true,
    autoplayTimeout:3000,
    autoplayHoverPause:true
  });
});
</script>
<script>
  $('#percent').on('change', function(){
  var val = parseInt($(this).val());
  var circleVal = $('#svg #bar');
  
  if (isNaN(val)) {
   val = 100; 
  }
  else{
    var r = circleVal.attr('r');
    var c = Math.PI*(r*2);
   
    if (val < 0) { val = 0;}
    if (val > 100) { val = 100;}
    
    var pct = ((100-val)/100)*c;
    
    circleVal.css({ strokeDashoffset: pct});
    
    $('#cont').attr('data-pct',val);
  }
});
</script>

<script defer="" type="text/javascript">
jQuery(document).ready(function($){
  $("a[href='#top']").click(function() {
  $("html, body").animate({ scrollTop: 0 }, "slow");
      return false;
  });
});
</script>

<script defer="">
  function getCookie(name) {
    var v = document.cookie.match('(^|;) ?' + name + '=([^;]*)(;|$)');
    return v ? v[2] : null;
  }
  function setCookie(name, value, days) {
    var d = new Date;
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + 24*60*60*1000*days);
    document.cookie = name + "=" + value + ";path=/;expires=" + d.toGMTString();
  }
  // Pobieranie przycisk√≥w
  const btnOne = document.querySelector('.ipsButtonTabelka_slider');
  const btnTwo = document.querySelector('.ipsButtonTabelka_classic');
  
  const contentOne = document.querySelector('.owl-carousel');
  const contentTwo = document.querySelector('.hitrow-classicserver');
  
  btnOne.addEventListener("click",() => {
    btnOne.classList.add("ipsButton_primary");
    btnTwo.classList.remove("ipsButton_primary");
    contentOne.style.display = "";
    $( ".hitrow-classicserver" ).hide();
    setCookie('serversTable_view', 0, 730);
  });
  
  btnTwo.addEventListener("click",() => {
    btnOne.classList.remove("ipsButton_primary");
    btnTwo.classList.add("ipsButton_primary");
	  contentOne.style.display = "none";
    $( ".hitrow-classicserver" ).show();
    setCookie('serversTable_view', 1, 730);
  });
  
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', (event) =>
  {
    let cookieTable = getCookie('serversTable_view');

    if(cookieTable === null)
    {
      cookieTable = "0";
      setCookie('serversTable_view', 0, 730);
    }

    if(cookieTable === "0")
    {
      btnOne.classList.add("ipsButton_primary");
      btnTwo.classList.remove("ipsButton_primary");
      contentOne.style.display = "";
      $( ".hitrow-classicserver" ).hide();
    }
    else
    {
      btnOne.classList.remove("ipsButton_primary");
      btnTwo.classList.add("ipsButton_primary");
      contentOne.style.display = "none";
      $( ".hitrow-classicserver" ).show();
    }
  });
</script>

{lang="block_TopPosters"}

{{$posters = \IPS\Db::i()->select( 'member_id, member_posts', 'core_members', '', 'member_posts DESC', 5, 'member_id' ); }}
